message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of a depreciable asset over its useful life. This is typically shown as "Depreciation" in a cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see that there is a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 91488.35 on 2024-02-05.

This is exactly what I'm looking for, as depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91488.35'} }
```
